price: 23. And his companion (angel) will say: "Here is (this Record) ready with me!"
arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: waqāla qarīnuhu hādhā mā ladayya ʿatīdun
